title: Best Nintendo Switch Accessories - Kinda Funny Gamescast Ep. 115 (Pt. 2)
description:
We talk about the best Nintendo Switch accessories currently available.

Thanks to MVMT Watches for sponsoring this episode. Go to http://www.MVMTwatches.com/kinda

Razer Power Bank:
 https://www.razerzone.com/gaming-accessories/razer-power-bank?ClickID=bfsnmdzqf1n6ss6eqvgymz61yfmzmgslgvyqdy

Recommended Dock Covers:
 https://www.etsy.com/search?q=nintendo+switch+dock

Waterfield: City Slicker: 
https://www.sfbags.com/collections/nintendo-3ds-cases/products/nintendo-switch-cityslicker-case

Nintendo’s Official Carrying Case:
https://www.amazon.com/Nintendo-Switch-Carrying-Case-Screen-Protector/dp/B01N226BBW/ref=sr_1_1?ie=UTF8&qid=1491867437&sr=8-1&keywords=nintendo+switch+official+case&_encoding=UTF8&tag=kinfun08-20&linkCode=ur2&linkId=ee41a1e932d8bb7880861b21b7ca1830&camp=1789&creative=9325

Anker GlassGuard Premium Screen Protector:
https://www.amazon.com/Anker-GlassGuard-Tempered-Protector-Nintendo/dp/B06XCXJZWJ/ref=sr_1_1?ie=UTF8&qid=1491867467&sr=8-1&keywords=nintendo+switch+anker+glassguard&_encoding=UTF8&tag=kinfun08-20&linkCode=ur2&linkId=309ac479d8874f78025e8cd6320e1da0&camp=1789&creative=9325

Orzly Premium Screen Protector:
https://www.amazon.com/Screen-Protector-Nintendo-Switch-Tempered/dp/B01N9RG3XS/ref=sr_1_1?ie=UTF8&qid=1491867494&sr=8-1&keywords=nintendo+switch+orzly&_encoding=UTF8&tag=kinfun08-20&linkCode=ur2&linkId=1e1aa05f1799c5e1b5c28b3c8c0e4e22&camp=1789&creative=9325

Kinda Funny Blue Joy Cons:
https://www.amazon.com/Nintendo-Switch-Joy-Con-Neon-Blue/dp/B01MT8USZN/ref=sr_1_5?ie=UTF8&qid=1491867591&sr=8-5&keywords=nintendo%2Bswitch%2Bjoy%2Bcons&th=1&_encoding=UTF8&tag=kinfun08-20&linkCode=ur2&linkId=6735a4567248a6e3015ad11f222f2b2d&camp=1789&creative=9325

Nintendo Pro Controller:
https://www.amazon.com/Nintendo-Switch-Pro-Controller/dp/B01NAWKYZ0/ref=sr_1_1?ie=UTF8&qid=1491867624&sr=8-1&keywords=nintendo+switch+pro&_encoding=UTF8&tag=kinfun08-20&linkCode=ur2&linkId=c27116f7131a461dc3c259b899e8fbe7&camp=1789&creative=9325

USB C: Anker PowerLine:
https://www.amazon.com/Anker-PowerLine-Resistor-Including-ChromeBook/dp/B01A6F3WHG/ref=sr_1_1?ie=UTF8&qid=1491871381&sr=8-1-spons&keywords=anker+powerline+usb+c&psc=1&_encoding=UTF8&tag=kinfun08-20&linkCode=ur2&linkId=14bb918df2f394cf6aa3997713f18a92&camp=1789&creative=9325

Anker PowerCore+ 26800: 3-4 charges:
https://www.amazon.com/Anker-PowerCore-Portable-Ultra-High-Capacity-Recharges/dp/B01N3TVRP2/ref=sr_1_1?ie=UTF8&qid=1491867762&sr=8-1&keywords=Anker+PowerCore%2B+26800&_encoding=UTF8&tag=kinfun08-20&linkCode=ur2&linkId=59713db570568ae8bc27324d72bd0b2b&camp=1789&creative=9325

Subscribe! http://www.youtube.com/kindafunnygames?sub_confirmation=1

Support us and get the shows early here! http://www.patreon.com/kindafunnygames

Check out our store! http://www.kindafunny.com/store

Follow us on Twitter!
Tim - http://www.twitter.com/TimGettys
Greg - http://www.twitter.com/GameOverGreggy
Colin - http://www.twitter.com/NoTaxation
Kinda Funny - http://www.twitter.com/KindaFunnyVids

Every day Greg Miller, Colin Moriarty, and Tim Gettys talk about the biggest stories in Video Games.

Background Wall Art by Orioto - https://www.facebook.com/OriotoPosters/
